mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply(rno, bno, replytext, replyer) VALUES(reply_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, replytext, replyer, regdate, updatedate FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(tbl_reply IDX_tbl_reply_PK)*/ rownum rn, rno, bno, replytext, replyer, regdate, updatedate FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} AND rno > 0 AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
